loans.name: Patricie

texts.en:
Patricie is 40 years old. She is married with seven children aged between 1 and 17 years. Six of her children are of school age. 

Patricie sells cattle, and she has been in this business for four years. Her husband is working as a business man. With the loan, she would like to buy more cattle to sell as meat. The profits from her business will used to pay school fees for her children and to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more cattle to sell as meat

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es:
Gonzalo es un hombre de 41 años de edad, casado, tiene 6 hijos de 17, 9, 8, 6, 5 y 3 años, y su negocio es el comercio de ganado.
Él es buen padre, emprendedora, independiente paciente, constante, responsable y trabajador, su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Palcoco’ ubicado a 40 kilómetros de la ciudad, cercana al lago Titicaca, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-12 grados centígrados.
Gonzalo es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, ojos obscuros, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general. Su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica a la producción de queso y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela y se dedican en sus tiempos libres a la agricultura, el hijo menor todavía no se encuentra en edad escolar, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe con techo de paja y que cuenta con electricidad y agua de pozo. Su negocio es el comercio de ganado. Debido al crecimiento de su familia construyó unas paredes para darles un cuarto a sus hijos, el cual no terminó de construir por falta de dinero. “mi familia crece cada día y quiero darles un cuarto donde vivir, me falta terminarlo para que vivan cómodamente…” comenta. Su sueño es darle a su familia un lugar cómodo donde puedan vivir, él desea terminar de construir las paredes de un cuarto y ponerle techo para que sus hijos vivan cómodamente y resguardados del frio del lugar. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 7 años que está construyendo esta habitación.
Es por esos motivos que Gonzalo solicita un préstamo para terminar de construir un cuarto donde sus hijos puedan vivir resguardados del clima del lugar.
texts.en:
Gonzalo is 41 years old, married and has six children, ages seventeen, nine, eight, six, five, and three years old. He is a cattle-raiser.

Gonzalo is a good father. He is enterprising, independent, patient, persevering, responsible, and hard-working. He runs his business in the Palcoco community, 40 kilometres from the city of El Alto, and near to Lake Titicaca. Here the climate is cold and dry, and the daily temperature oscillates between 2 and 12º Celsius.

Gonzalo has dark skin, and short black hair. He is short, with brown eyes, and a robust physique. His native language is Aymara, which he speaks at home, and he also speaks Spanish. Gonzalo shares his life with his wife, who makes cheese for a living, and with his children, who are in school and spend their free time doing farming work. Gonzalo’s youngest child is not yet old enough to go to school.

Gonzalo and his family live in a house built with adobe bricks, and a straw roof. The house has electricity and water from a well. 

With such a big family, Gonzalo put up some walls to give his children a room but he was not able to finish this owing to a lack of cash. Gonzalo says, “My family is growing every day and I want to give them a place to live. I still need to finish it so that they can live comfortably.” Gonzalo’s dream is to give his family a comfortable place to live. He wants to finish building the walls of a room, and put a roof up, in order for his children to live comfortably and protected from the cold. 

This is Gonzalo’s second loan with Emprender, in seven years of building this home.

For the reasons given above, Gonzalo is applying for a loan in order to finish building a room where his children can be protected from the climate.

loans.use: to finish building a room so that his children can be protected from the local climate.

loans.name: Omar David

texts.es:
Omar de 23 años de edad, estudió hasta 6to grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen una bebé de 5 meses y viven en el terreno del suegro pero vive aparte en su casa con su pareja e hija. 
Es agricultor desde muy pequeño y aprendió de su madre a sembrar maíz y frijol, además desde hace 3 años es comerciante de ropa y de hamacas y aprendió el negocio de su madre pues e s comerciante; el sale a comprar los productos a otros cantones y luego los comercializa. 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar ropa, hamacas y  una yunta de bueyes.
Su sueño es seguir adelante  trabajando para mantener a su familia y que no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Omar is 23 years old and has a sixth grade education. He has a partner, who looks after the household chores. The couple has a five-month-old baby. The family lives on land owned by Omar’s father-in-law, but not in the same house with him.

Omar has been a farmer since a very young age. He learned to sow corn and beans from his mother. Omar is also a businessman, trading clothes and hammocks, something else that he learned from his mother who is a businesswoman. Omar goes out to other cantons to buy products to sell.

Omar needs this loan in order to buy clothes, hammocks and a herd of oxen.

Omar’s dream is to continue moving forward to support his family and provide them with everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy clothes, hammocks and a herd of oxen.

loans.name: Rudy Aldubi

texts.es:
Rudy de 21 años de edad, estudió hasta 8vo grado, está casado y su pareja es cajera de un market, tienen un hijo  de 2 años y vive por el momento con su abuela y tía. 
Rudy es empelado de una gasolinera desde hace meses, y también realiza trabajos de albañilería, el trabajo lo tiene a unos 10 minutos de su hogar y el horario es por turnos. 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar puertas y cerámica para terminar de construir su propia casa. 

Su sueño es terminar de construir la casa, ya que ha puesto un esfuerzo con su esposa para tenerla y servirá para el patrimonio de sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en:
Rudy is 21 years old and has an eighth grade education. He is married; his wife works at the check-outs in a supermarket. The couple has a two-year-old son. The family is currently living with Rudy’s grandmother and aunt.

Rudy has been working at a petrol station for a number of months, and also does building work. The petro station is only ten minutes away from his house. He works shifts.

Rudy needs this loan in order to buy doors and tiles to finish building his own house.

Rudy’s dream is to finish building his house. With his wife, he has worked hard to buy the house and it is something that he can leave to his children in the future.

loans.use: to buy doors and tiles to finish building his own house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open a small shop in her house, and to build metal sheeting to repair her roof.

loans.name: Grace's Group

texts.en:
Grace is a 69-year-old proud mother of six children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of nine farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Grace has learned a lot from farm training sessions. 

Grace described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, as well as fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to invest in her business.

With this loan, Grace’s Group will be able to plant a total of six acres of land and purchase a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Mkonga Road Group

texts.en:
Anna, who is in her mid-30s, is married with one child, who is still going to school. She has been selling charcoal to the wholesale market for one year now. She works from 7am to 8pm daily, and is able to make good monthly profit.  

This will be Anna's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to sell at wholesale prices. She dreams of increasing her inventory for her charcoal business.

Anna will share this loan with her loan group "MKONGA ROAD" which consist of three members, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to sell at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en: Lourdes is a sari-sari store owner from Moalboal, Cebu. She is 49 years old and married with five children. Lourdes has operated her small grocery store for more than two years now. This is the only source of her income. Lourdes is asking to take a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, bread and biscuits, soap and toiletries, soda and beverages, cooking oil and condiments and coffee and sugar, etc. Through this loan, Lourdes will be able to improve and increase her inventory, allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Lourdes hopes of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis, de 27 años de edad, es emprededor y trabajador, estudio hasta segundo grado, tiene 2 hijos, está acompañado.

Luis, posee un negocio de venta de helados, paletas y sorbetes, tiene 2 años de dedicarse a este negocio.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar más helados, para darles más opciones de compra a sus clientes.

Lo que más desea a futuro es poder darle el estudio a sus hijos y que algun día puedan ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Luis, 27, is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a second grade education.  He and his partner have two children.

For two years, Luis has been selling ice cream, popsicles and sherbets.  He is in need of a loan to buy more ice cream so he can offer a wider variety to his customers.

What he desires most for the future is to give his children an education so they can become professionals.

loans.use: To buy more ice cream.

loans.name: Kitoben Women Group

texts.en:
The person raising her hand in the photo is Sarah, a member of Kitoben Women's Group. She is thirty five years old and has five children. Two of her children are in primary school while one is in secondary school. Sarah is married and lives with her husband. 
She grows maize and potatoes in Nakuru, Kenya. She is taking a loan to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers to boost her crop yield. She looks forward to a bounty harvest, thus more income. This will enable her to provide for her family's needs, such as food and education, with ease. 
Sarah is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support and she promises to pay promptly.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for improving her harvest that will enable her to provide for her family's needs such as food and education

loans.name: Grupo Sector Mangales Aldea Guineales Group

texts.es:
Anavela (la primera del lado derecho  de blusa amarillo) es una señora de 26 años de edad es soltera vive  junto a sus padres en una comunidad de Guineales.
Anavela una mujer amable y muy perseverante, que con los principios que su madre le inculco que en esta vida se debe siempre luchar por los sueños es por eso que ella se dedica a la venta de ropa típica desde hace 5 años vendiendo en varios lugares circunvecinos de su comunidad en piso plazo,  esta actividad ella lo realiza con el fin de generar ingresos y ayudar a su familia, para Anavela no hay nada más importante que su familia, pero Anavela ahora quiere mejorar su negocio, porque el mundo cada vez está más de moda, pero para hacerlo ella no cuenta con el capital suficiente, es por eso que se ha unido a un grupo de señoras con la misma necesidad, para solicitar un prestamo que lo utilizara  para comprar más ropa típica con telas nuevas y modernas.
El sueño de Anavela es poder contar con este crédito, para realizar su inversión y mejorar sus ingresos y que algún día pueda contar con una tienda donde pueda exhibir mejor su producto.
texts.en:
Anavela (first from the right in a yellow blouse) is 26 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in the community of Guineales.  She is a kind, very perseverant woman whose mother taught her that in life one must fight for one's dreams.  Therefore, for five years she has been selling typical clothing in neighboring communities to generate an in come and help her family.  

For Anavela there is nothing more important than her family.  Now she wants to improve her business because of new fashion development.  But she does not have enough capital and has joined a group of women with the same needs to request a loan to buy more typical clothing in new, modern fabrics.

Anavela's dream is to receive the loan so she can invest in her business and earn more income.  One day she would like to have her own shop to display her products better.

loans.use: To buy typical clothing.

loans.name: George

texts.en: Goerge is a 39-year-old married father of 4 children aged 12,9,7, and 5. All of these children attend school. He is a pineapple grower from Rwekitooma, Nyarugoote in Bushenyi, Uganda. He works for 7 hours a day as a guard and he started a tea farming business in 2002 to generate income for educating his 4 children. This is his first loan from this institution and he is borrowing UGX 2,500,000 to buy fertilizer for a pineapple plantation in addition to his salary. His clients are all categories of people, schools and hotels from around Bushenyi district. Eventually, he hopes to buy a car for transporting his pineapples to schools and hotels. He is mostly affected by price fluctuations of pineapples and competition from other farmers. He is honest and shrewd, that’s why he promised to be loyal to the institution by repaying his loan on the due date. Pictured is George with his wife at the pineapple plantation.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy different kinds of clothing for her business.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
A sra Luisa é casada, mae de 06 filhos dos quais 01 é que está na sua responsabilidade e os restantes são maiores de idade. O seu esposo passa mais tempo a cuidar da criaçao na sua fazenda e a sra Luisa cuida da machamba( horta e outras culturas).
Está a construir uma casa para confortar o seu filho e com o emprestimo pretende comprar janelas e cimento para concluir a sua casa. O desafio da sra Luisa é pagar o credito para poder solicitar outros emprestimos.
texts.en: Luisa is a married mother to 6 children, one of whom still lives at home with her and the others live independently. Her husband spends most of his time tending their plantation while Luisa takes care of their home garden and other crops. She is building a home for them so that her son will be more comfortable and she plans to use this loan to buy windows and cement to finish the building work. The greatest challenge that she faces is repaying this loan so that she can apply for others.

loans.use: to buy windows and cement to finish building her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase farming tools

loans.name: Zenaida Marisela

texts.es:
Zenaida de 41 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está casada y su esposo  es motorista de un centro escolar, tiene 3 hijos y solamente uno estudia 9no grado, y nadie más vive con ellos. 
Zenaida es comerciante en pequeño, ella vende tamarindo desde hace 5 años y aprendió por medio de su tía quien se ha dedicado al negocio, lo que hace es comprar el tamarindo en época de flota al mercado y luego hace el proceso para la venta y así los comercializa por varios meses, además tiene unos cerdos que los compró y en término de 6 meses los venderá. 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar quintales de tamarindo para luego distribuirlos al mercado  ya sin cascaras y por libras. 
Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para mantener a sus hijos y darles el estudio, y espera que le vaya de lo mejor en las ventas cada día para  tener ingresos y con ello seguir invirtiendo en el negocio.
texts.en:
Zenaida, 41, has a high school education.  She is married and her husband is a school transport driver.  She has three children but only one is still at home and is in ninth grade.

Zenaida is a retail merchant and has been selling tamarind for five years.  She learned the trade from her aunt who is in the same business.  She buys the tamarind at market time and processes it for sale over several months.  She also raises pigs and sells them over a six-month period.

The loan she is requesting is to buy quintals of tamarind which she will sell later, shelled and by the pound.  

Her dream is to continue working to support her children in their education.  She hopes sales will improve so she can earn a daily income and continue investing in her business.

loans.use: To buy quintals of tamarind to sell at market.

loans.name: Flor Veronica

texts.es:
Veronica, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada y tiene 3 hijos, es una familia muy unida, está trabajando como empleada, en el negocio de su mamá desde hace 5 años.

Anteriomente, trabajaba como ama de casa lavando ropa.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar lámina, clavos, un inodoro y madera; además el resto del dinero lo utilizará para elaborar arreglos florares, para venderlos el día de los difuntos.

Flor, sueña con darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y seguir trabajando con su mamá para que el negocio tenga éxito.
texts.en:
Veronica, 33, has a third grade education.  She and her partner have three children and they are a very close family.  Veronica works as an employee in her mother's business where she has worked for five years.  She used to work as a homemaker doing laundry.

She is need of a loan to buy metal sheeting, nails, a toilet and wood.  The rest of the loan will be used to make floral arrangements to sell on All Saints' Day.

Flor Veronica dreams of giving her children a better quality of life and to continue working for her mother so her business is a success.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, nails, a toilet and wood.

loans.name: Ingrid Siomara

texts.es:
Ingrid, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, es madre soltera y vive junto a sus hijos.

Ingrid, tiene negocio de compra y venta de verduras, frutas, panes, gaseosas y refrescos desde hace un año.

El financiamiento lo necesita para comprar más productos para su negocio.

Ella sueña a futuro con ver a sus hijos graduados de la universidad y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Ingrid, 28, has an eighth grade education.  She is a single mother and lives with her children.  For a year she has been in business selling vegetables, fruits, breads, sodas and softdrinks.  

The loan she is requesting is to buy more products for her business.  Her dream is to see her children graduate from college and to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Zeka Women Group

texts.en:
The person standing on the left-hand side in the photo is Nancy. She is a 46-year-old married mother of four children who are in primary school. Hand in Hand, Eastern Africa’s training program, have helped her improve and acquire knowledge on enterprise management, record keeping and also financial management.
 She is a vegetable farmer. She is requesting a Kiva loan to buy fertilizer and manure. This will help improve the crop yield. She looks forward to improved incomes that will assist in providing school fees for her children.
Nancy is happy for Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizer to improve crop yields which will assist to cover school costs of her children

loans.name: Amavi

texts.fr: Amavi est un homme marié qui est âgé de 42 ans. Amavi vit à Kpogan avec sa femme et ses  cinq enfants. Pour assurer les besoins quotidiens de sa famille, Amavi vend des produits d’alimentations générales et trouver la rentabilité nécessaire. Amavi s’approvisionne au marché d’Akodessewa deux fois par mois. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs et alimenter sa boutique, Amavi sollicite ce crédit pour financer sa commande et avoir une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Amavi is a 42-year-old married man.  He lives in Kpogan with his wife and five children.  Amavi sells general food products in order to make enough money to provide for the day-to-day needs of his family.  He buys his supplies from the market in Akodessewa, twice a month.

Amavi has requested this loan to buy sacks of maize for sale in his shop.  He expects to make a good profit and be able to pay for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of maize and 4 boxes of tomatoes for resale.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan de 46 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar de debido a que sus padres eran pobres, está casado y su esposa trabaja en los oficios del hogar, tiene 4 hijos y solo una estudia bachillerato y además vive una nuera con ellos. 
Juan se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura y aprendió de sus padres generalmente siembra maíz y maicillo en la comunidad donde vive,  además realiza trabajos de albañil como ayudante, cuando siembra le ayudan sus hijos y además cuenta con ganado propio que cuando tiene una necesidad los vende. 
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una novilla con el fin de criarla y en un futuro poder venderla cuando él estime conveniente. 
Su sueño es mejorar su casa y cuando siembre tener buenas cosechas para el consumo y la venta, y que su hija sea una profesional.
texts.en:
Juan, who is 46 years old, did not have the opportunity to study because his parents were poor. He is married, and his wife works in the home. He has 4 children, and only one of them goes to high school. A sister-in-law also lives with them.
Juan has worked his whole life in agriculture, and he learned from his parents. Usually he sows maize and sorghum in the community where he lives. He also does construction work as an assistant. His children help him with the sowing and he also has his own livestock, which he sells when it is needed. 
The loan will be used to purchase a heifer with the goal of breeding it, and in the future, sell it when he thinks it is convenient. 
His dream is to improve his home, and when he sows to have good crops for consumption and sale, and that his daughter becomes a professional.

loans.use: to purchase a heifer for breeding, and in the future, sell it when it is convenient.

loans.name: Grupo Xojola Sector Parroquia. Group

texts.es:
Yolanda (la segunda del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa cafés) es una mujer de 19 años de edad, es soltera vive junto a sus padres en una comunidad de Xojola  y tiene una hijo de 3 años.
Yolanda a pesar de ser muy joven ya cuenta con una familia que debe mantener  pues ella se juntó con su esposo a una edad muy temprana, Yolanda ama mucho a su familia pues para obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la producción de banano pues ella vive en una zona  muy fértil y produce buenos  bananos,ella se dedica a esta actividad pues ha esto se dedica toda su familia, Yolanda ya tiene 5 años de realizar esta producción. Pero Yolanda ha plantado banano que en estos días necesita que se le de mantenimiento, pero una de las limitaciones que ella tiene es que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder hacerlo entonces ella ha organizado a un grupo de personas quienes también se dedican a la misma actividad, para solicitar  un prestamo que lo utilizara para la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra.
El sueño de Yolanda es poder conseguir este prestamo para seguir ampliando su cultivo de banano.
texts.en:
Yolanda (second from the left in the photograph, wearing a brown shirt) is a 19-year-old woman, she is single and she lives with her parents in a community of Xojola, and she has a 3-year-old son.
Yolanda, in spite of being very young, already has a family which she has to support. She got together with her husband at a very young age. Yolanda loves her family very much. To obtain her income, she works in banana production, as she lives in a fertile area and produces good bananas. She has this occupation because her whole family has the same occupation. Yolanda has been producing this for the last 5 years. She has planted banana trees that needs maintenance, but one of the limitations is that she does not have enough capital to do it, so she has organized a group of people who also work in the same occupation, to ask for a loan which will be used to purchase fertilizers and to pay the workers. 
Yolanda’s dream is to be able to get this loan to keep expanding her banana crops.

loans.use: to pay workers and purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Agée de 26 ans et mère de trois enfants, Eya est une femme mariée qui vit à Avépozo avec toute sa famille. Eya vend des mèches dans son quartier et gagne une bonne rentabilité dans son activité. Eya s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé trois fois par mois. Pour acheter d’autres stocks de mèches, Eya souhaite ce crédit pour commander ses articles et tirer une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour venir en aide aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en:
Eya is a 26-year-old married woman.  She lives in Avépozo with her husband, three children and the rest of her family.  Eya sells hair extensions in her local district and makes a good profit.  She buys her supplies from the main market in Lomé, three times a month.

Eya has requested this loan to buy further stocks of hair extensions for sale.  She expects to make a good profit and be able to help provide for the day-to-day needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 36 units of hair extensions for resale.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Abla est une femme mariée de 45 ans qui vit à Avépozo avec ses deux enfants. Abla est très dynamique et met son aptitude à aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes de la famillle en vendant des pagnes dans le quartier. Abla s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour passer une nouvelle commande, Abla demande ce crédit pour acheter des pagnes et réaliser le bénéfice qu’elle souhaite.
texts.en:
Abla is a 45-year-old married woman.  She lives in Avépozo with her husband and two children.  Abla is very dynamic and uses this to help her husband to provide for the day-to-day needs of her family.  She sells pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) in her local district.  She buys her supplies from the market, twice a month.

Abla has requested this loan to buy further supplies of pagnes for sale.  She expects to make a good profit from the sale of her pagnes.

loans.use: to buy 5 lots of pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) for resale.

loans.name: Jose Abdon

texts.es:
José, de 54 años de edad, nunca fue a la escuela, vive junto a su familia y toda la vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, aprendió este oficio de sus padres y goza de buena reputación en la comunidad.

El financiamiento lo necesita para cancelar el alquiler de la tierra, comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar mano de obra.

José, sueña con darle un buen futuro a su familia y mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
José, who is 54 years of age, never went to school. He lives with his family, and all his life he has made a living farming. He learned this trade from his parents, and he enjoys a good reputation in his community.

He needs the loan in order to pay for the rent of the land, buy agricultural supplies, and pay for labour.

José dreams of providing a better future for his family and improving his house.

loans.use: to pay the rent of the land, buy agricultural supplies, and pay for the cost of labour.

loans.name: María Herculana

texts.es:
María, se decidió por un nuevo crédito por la facilidad de pago y la confianza que le brinda la institución, invertirá en pita plástica y de mescal, así podrá elaborar lazos, pitas, matates entre otros productos.
Con los créditos ha ido progresando con su negocio, sus demandas han crecido considerablemente, pudo adquirir con las ganancias un nuevo torno para aumentar la producción y con su familia comparte mejor alimentación salud y vestuario.
texts.en:
María decided to request a new loan due to the financial arrangements and trust that the institution offers her. She will invest in plastic and fiber cord, so she can make rope and string tote bags, among other products. 

With the loans, her business has progressed, the demand for her products has grown considerably, she was able to purchase a new spinning wheel to increase the production, and her family share better food, health, and clothing.

loans.use: to buy plastic cord.

loans.name: Alindor

texts.es:
Alindor tiene 39 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y sus 03 hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café de la variedad catimore, cuenta con experiencia en este sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de variedad de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Alindor is 39 years old. He lives in his own house made of rustic materials. He lives with his wife and their 3 children in a rural area of the Pucará district. It is a community that works in agriculture, trade and cattle ranching. It is located in the province of Jaén, which belongs to the Cajamarca region, in the northern sierra of Peru.

He works in agriculture, especially in growing coffee of the catimor variety. He has experience in this area and has very good personal and work references.   He has asked for a loan to buy a variety of composts and fertilizers for maintenance of his coffee crop. This way he can have a timely yield to offer his customers and generate more income for his family, which will improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of composts and fertilizers to do maintenance on his coffee crop.

loans.name: Fidel Arístides

texts.es:
Fidel de 47 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor, ya cuenta con una pequeña granja de pollos de engorde, actualmente vive con su único hijo de un año de edad y su compañera de vida quien a parte de dedicarse a los oficios domésticos, también comercializa pollos faenados en el mercado.

Fidel tiene un año y medio de experiencia en la crianza de pollos de engorde, antes había estado 10 años en los Estados unidos trabajando en actividades de manejo de pollos de engorde y fue así como aprendió este rubro. Regresó hace un año y medio y desde ese día esta produciendo pollos de engorde de la mejor calidad y los vende a muy buen precio.


El dinero lo necesita para construir otra galera para pollos de engorde, ya que tiene planeado tener mayor cantidad de dichos animales.

Fidel quiere ser de los proveedores de pollos mas fuertes en su ciudad y mejorar su vida.
texts.en:
Fidel is 47 years old. He is a very hardworking and enterprising man, as he has a small farm for fattening chickens. He currently lives with his only son, who is a year old, and his life partner, who dedicates herself to domestic tasks. Fidel also sells butchered chickens at the market.

Fidel has a year and a half of experience in raising and fattening chickens. Before that he spent ten years in the United States working in the management of chicken fattening, and that was how he learned this business. He returned a year and a half ago and since then he has been producing fattened chickens of the highest quality, selling them at a very good price.

He needs the money to build another galley for fattening chickens, as he has planned to have a greater quantity of these animals.

Fidel wants to be one of the strongest suppliers of chickens in his city and to improve his life.

loans.use: to build another galley for fattening chickens, as he has planned to have a greater quantity of these animals

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
A senhora Maria é viuva, mae de 04 filhos dos quais um é que frequenta a escola e os restantes sao maiores de idade. Para além dos seus filhos, tem ainda na sua responsabilidade os seus 04 netos.
 Com o emprestimo pretende comprar batatas, cebola, alho, tomate no mercado grossista para revender na sua mini mercearia, na sua casa. O seu sonho é ter uma viatura para a facilitar nas deslocaçoes do seu negocio e o desafio é reembolsar o emprestimo.
texts.en: Maria is a widowed mother to 4 children, one of whom is still in education while the rest are living independently. Asides from her own children, she is also financially responsible for her 4 grandchildren. She plans to use this loan to buy potatoes, onions, garlic and tomatoes from the wholesale market so that she can re-sell these in her own small grocery store which she runs from her home. She dreams of being able to buy a vehicle to help with transporting the items she sells and the greatest challenge that she faces is repaying her loan.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, onions, garlic and tomatoes from the wholesale market to re-sell in her grocery shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase nzcazol [a type of black dye], different types of clay, and firewood to make earthenware griddles, frying pans, pots, etc.

loans.name: Ada Veronica

texts.es:
Ada, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada y su esposo está en los Estados Unidos y tiene un hijo de 12 años de edad.

Ada, necesita el crédito para comprar arena y cemento para hacerle algunas reparaciones a su casa y hacer una cerca en las orillas del terreno.

El sueño de Ada, es tener una casa digna y segura, además de apoyar a la educación de su hijo, para que sea profesional.
texts.en: Ada is 34 years old and studied up to the ninth grade. She is married and her husband is in the United States. She has a twelve-year-old son. Ada needs the loan to buy sand and cement to do some repairs to her house and to build a fence around the edges of the property. Ada's dream is to have a dignified and secure house, and to support her son's education so he can become a professional.

loans.use: to buy sand and cement to do some repairs to her house and to build a fence around the edges of the property

loans.name: José Alexander

texts.es:
José de 21 años de edad, es un joven que vive con sus padres  y su hermana menor, es el penúltimo de tres hermanos, él cuida de sus padres y es por eso que le cuesta mucho organizarse para ir a estudiar y trabajar a la vez.

José es muy perseverante con sus estudios, él trata de acomodar a sus horarios para poder trabajar como albañil junto a su hermano mayor de quien aprendió el oficio desde hace unos años.

Él necesita el crédito para solventar algunas necesidades de sus estudios universitarios como el pago de las cuotas, compra de útiles y pagar transporte para trasladarse ya que se le dificulta mucho, y comprar sus alimentos también.

Sus planes son seguir trabajando para graduarse convertirse en un profesional y así poder ayudar económicamente a su familia y principalmente a sus padres ya que ellos padecen problemas de salud.
texts.en:
José is 21 years old. He is a young man who lives with his parents and his younger sister. He is the middle of three siblings. He takes care of his parents and that is why is is hard for him to get organized to go to school and work at the same time.  

José is very persevering in his education. He tries to arrange his schedule to be able to work as a bricklayer with his older brother from whom he learned the trade a few years ago. 

He needs the loan to pay for some things he needs for his college education, such as paying tuition, buying supplies and paying for transportation to get there, since it is very difficult, as well as buying food.  

His plans are to keep working to graduate and become a professional, as well as help his family financially, mainly his parents, since they have health problems.

loans.use: to pay for some necessities for his college education, such as paying tuition, buying supplies, and paying for transportation to get there.

loans.name: Ana Berta

texts.es:
Ana de 46 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 han formado sus propios hogares y el otro depende de ella.


Ella ha sido vendedora de ropa femenina y juvenil desde que tenía 17 años, lo cual lo hacía en la calle afuera de los mercados, pero desde hace un par de años camina hacia los cantones a vender la mercadería.

Ana necesita el crédito para comprar mas ropa como blusas, pantalones, ropa interior, faldas, etc y así tener siempre mercadería disponible.


Ana quiere seguir trabajando un par de años mas y después dedicarse únicamente a cuidar a sus nietos.
texts.en:
Ana, 46 years old, is married and has 4 children, of whom 3 have made their own households and the other depends on her.

She has been a saleswoman of women's and children's clothing for 17 years, which she did on the street outside the markets but a couple years ago, she moved to the cantons to sell her merchandise. 

Ana needs the loan to purchase more clothing such as blouses, pants, lingerie, skirts, etc. and in this way to always have merchandise available. 

Ana wants to continue working for a couple more years and after that would like to focus only on caring for her grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing such as blouses, pants, lingerie, skirts, etc. and in this way to always have merchandise available.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.pt:
A sra Raquel tem 30 anos de idade, casada e mae de 02 filhos dos quais 01 frenquenta o ensino primário e o outro nao estuda devido a problemas mentais e o seu esposo é pedreiro na vizinha África do sul.
 Com o empréstimo pretende comprar duvetes, mantas, fatos, camisas e calças para revender e ajudar o seu marido nas despesas do dia-a-dia. O sonho da dona Raquel é ter uma loja para passar a vender a sua mercadoria.
O desafio da dona Raquel é trabalhar mais de modo a superar as dificuldades financeiras que frequenta.
texts.en: Raquel is a 30 year old married mother to 2 children, one of whom attends primary school and her other child does not due to mental health issues. Her husband works as a bricklayer in neighbouring South Africa. She plans to use this loan to buy duvets, blankets, suits, shirts and shoes to re-sell so that she can help her husband with the household expenses. Raquel's dream is to have a shop where she can sell her stock and the greatest challenge that she faces is in relation to finding enough work to help her overcome the financial difficulties she frequently encounters.

loans.use: to buy duvets, blankets, suits, shirts and shoes to re-sell.

loans.name: Gaviotas Doradas Group

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 21 años, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de 1 año, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, atenta, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en el barrio ‘San Jorge’ un lugar céntrico caracterizado por el cambódromo; que es dónde se realiza el corso de carnavales, una de las fiestas más importantes del lugar, de clima cálido, tropical y húmedo con una temperatura constante entre 3-35 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Maria es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos obscuros, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia, y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (la primera de la derecha, usa polera negra y calza floreada). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la construcción y con hijo que es un bebé, viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. La necesidad por mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia la llevo a conformar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de frutas, servicio de transporte, venta de jugos, venta de tarjetas de teléfono, venta de desayunos, venta de ropa y servicio de café, para solicitar un préstamo y cumplir con sus aspiraciones. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional como; el pacumutu (carne y yuca ensartadas en un palito, a la brasa), sonso de yuca (yuca aplastada y amasada con queso a la brasa), majadito (arroz amarillo, huevo frito y plátano). “todas las noches me encargo de dejar la comida preparada para que al día siguiente esté lista y solo deba fritarla o cocerla, la comida típica es una tradición en mi familia…” comenta. Su sueño es tener un negocio rentable con mucha clientela, y desea ampliar su negocio realizando la compra de sillas e insumos como; yuca, carne, harina y otros. Ya lleva un año de experiencia en el rubro y esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de sillas e insumos de cocina para atender a más clientes y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a 21-year-old woman, lives her partner, has a 1-year-old child, and her business is selling traditional dishes.

She is a good mother, enterprising, attentive, responsible, and hard-working. Her business is located in the San Jorge neighborhood, a central location characterized by the Cambódromo, which is where they have the carnival route, one of the most important festivals in the place. It has a warm, tropical and humid climate with a constant temperature between 3-35 degrees centigrade throughout out the year.

Maria has dark skin, long black hair that she keeps tied up, dark eyes, a robust physique, her native language is Guaraní, which she speaks with her family, and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and the business that she does (she is the first on the right, wearing a black shirt and flowered pants).

She shares her life with her partner, who works in construction, and with their son who is a baby. They live in a rented room built of brick with a roof of metal sheeting which has drinking water, electricity, and sewer service. The need to improve living conditions for her family brought her to make a bank of people with businesses such as fruit sales, transportation services, juice sales, telephone card sales, breakfast sales, clothing sales, and a cafe service, to ask for a loan and to realize their aspirations. Her business is selling traditional dishes such as pacumutu (meat and yucca skewered on a stick and barbecued), sonso de yuca (mashed yucca mixed with cheese and barbecued), majadito (yellow rice, fried egg and plantain). "Every night, I make sure to have the food prepared so that the next day I'm ready and only have to fry and cook it. The typical dishes are a tradition in my family..." she says. 

Her dream is to have a profitable business with many customers and she wants to expand her business purchasing chairs and supplies such as yucca, meat, flour, and others. She has a year of experience in this field and it is her first loan cycle with the institution.

For these reasons, Maria asks for a loan to purchase chairs and cooking supplies to serve more customers and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and cooking supplies to serve more customers and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Helen Patricia

texts.es:
Helen tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos en una pequeña casa que con esfuerzos de toda la familia han logrado construir en su comunidad, su otro hijo ya ha formado su propio hogar.


Helen tiene más de 20 años trabajando como costurera y siempre es buscada por los miembros de la comunidad para hacer sus trabajos, ya que tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio y es reconocida por su calidad para trabajar.


Ella necesita mucho de este crédito para comprar hilos, botones zippers y telas para seguir trabajando en la costura.

Ella sueña con seguir aportando a la economía familiar a través de sus trabajos y está pensando en hacer  algunas docenas de camisas y tenerlas de venta en su casa.
texts.en:
Helen is 41 years old and lives with her husband and their two children in a small house that with the efforts of the entire family they have managed to build in their community. Her other child has already formed his own household. 

Helen has more than 20 years working as a seamstress and is always sought out by community members to make their work since she has a lot of experience in the business an dis known for the quality of her work. 

She needs this credit a lot to purchase thread, buttons, zippers, and fabric to continue working as a seamstress.

She dreams of continuing to support the family economy through her labors and is thinking of making several dozen shirts and having them for sale in her house.

loans.use: to purchase thread, buttons, zippers and fabric to continue working as a seamstress.

loans.name: Janefie

texts.en:
Janefie is a married woman and a mother of three children from Moalboal, Cebu. 

She is engaged in tricycle transport business with her husband. This is their main source of income for more than five years now. Janefie also operates a small sari-sari or retail store at her home. 

Janefie is requesting to take a loan to buy spare parts for the tricycle like tires, nuts and bolts, chains and gasoline. This loan will help Janefie and her husband maintain a good working condition of the tricycle. 

Janefie hopes to invest in another venture to augment their income. She also wants to save money for the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the tricycle like tires, nuts and bolts, chains and gasoline

loans.name: Benard's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Benard, who is the group leader and is representing his group of 12 farmers in Webuye District, Kenya. He is married and is a father to 2 children, and is known in his community as a very hardworking individual.

Initially, Benard joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because he wanted to earn enough to feed his family. Since he joined the program he says that his life has improved, especially because he has had more profits from each harvest. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Benard plans to send his children to school.

Between the 12 farmers in Benard's Group, a total of 6.75 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 8 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Leona

texts.en:
Leona is a 50-year-old married woman and the mother of four children from Moalboal, Cebu. 

She makes a living through her sari-sari, or retail store.  Leona has operated her store for more than a year now. Leona sells various goods and food items to her customers. 

As of now, she is requesting a loan to buy stock, like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and condiments among other things.  

A loan will enable her to improve her stocks thus attracting more buyers in her store.

loans.use: to buy stock, like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and condiments among other things

loans.name: Maendeleo Women Group(Kwa Jogoo)

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand in the photo is Betty, a member of Maendeleo women group (Kwa Jogoo) in Nakuru. She is thirty years old, married and blessed with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in August 2013. 

Betty farms maize and beans and she also rears sheep.  With the training she got from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa, she has been able to run her enterprise more effectively, unlike before.  She is borrowing a Kiva loan to purchase farm inputs such as seeds fertilizers and animal feed. This will increase her farm production and meet the demand for cereals. 

She looks forward to more income that will go a long way in supporting her children’s education and family basic needs. 

Betty is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ink, printer paper, furniture, and to do some maintenance to the computers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn, propane gas, vegetables, etc. to make tamales and tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is a tricycle driver from Moalboal, Cebu. He is married and has three children. 

Ricardo is asking to take a loan to buy spare parts for the tricycle such as tires, nuts and bolts, chains, gasoline and other such things.  With this, he will be able to earn more income through transporting passengers using his tricycle. 

In the future, Ricardo hopes of making his business a success.  Moreover, he wants to save money for his children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his tricycle such as tires, nuts and bolts, chains, gasoline and other such things

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is a fish vendor and vegetable vendor from Moalboal, Cebu. She is 44 years old, married and a mother of three grown up children. 

Marcelina has been in the business for more than 15 years now. This is the sole source of her income. 

Marcelina is requesting a loan to buy more fish and vegetables to sell. A loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more fish and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca, de 55 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene un hijo que aún vive con ella.

Blanca, se dedica al comercio de mariscos, está actividad la ha realizado desde hace más de 20 años, ella no sabe leer, pero es muy buena para los negocios, ya que por medio de ellos obtiene los ingresos suficientes para los gastos de su familia. 

Blanca, solicita  el crédito para comprar todo tipo de mariscos, para comercializarlos en la ciudad que está a  40 millas aproximadamente.

Uno de sus sueños es comprar un terreno, para que su hijo construya su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Blanca, 55 years old, is partnered and has a son who still lives with her.

Blanca works selling shellfish, she has done this work for more than 20 years. She doesn't know how to read but she is very good at business, since through that she gets enough income for her family's expenses.

Blanca asks for the loan to purchase all sorts of shellfish to sell them in the city that is about 40 miles away. 

One of her dreams is to purchase a plot of land so that her son can build his own house.

loans.use: to purchase all sorts of shellfish to sell them.

loans.name: Cupertino

texts.es:
Cupertino, de 39 años de edad, está casado, tiene cinco hijos, de los cuales 3 de ellos estudian, su esposa es ama de casa y se encarga del cuidado de sus hijos.
Cupertino, trabaja en una tejera; se levanta a las 3:00 de la madrugada para comenzar su jornada laboral, solo descansa 3 horas en el día, tiene 15 años desempeñando este trabajo y ahora sus hijos le ayudan por la tarde.

El crédito lo necesita para arreglar algunas cosas en su negocio, para obtener mejores ingresos y también para  mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y poder darle a sus hijos un mejor futuro.

Cupertino, desea darle a su familia mejor alimentación y lograr que sus hijos estudien para que logren llegara a ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Cupertino is 39 years old, married and has 5 children, 3 of whom study. His wife is a housewife and she is in charge of caring for the children.

Cupertino works making tiles. He gets up at 3 in the morning to begin his work day. He only rests for 3 hours during the day. He has been doing this work for 15 years and now his children help him in the afternoon.

He needs the loan to arrange some things in his business so that he can make more income. And he needs to improve the conditions of his house to provide his children with a better future. Cupertino wants to provide his family with better food and manage to get his children to study to become professionals.

loans.use: to arrange some things in his business.

loans.name: Janepher's Group

texts.en:
Janepher is a 64-year-old proud mother of 7 children. She is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing her group of 12 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Janepher has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Janepher described her harvest as excellent last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to buy a cow.

With this loan, Janepher’s Group will be able to plant a total of 5.25 acres of land and purchase a total of 9 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
Ernestina, de 34 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado en la escuela de su comunidad, está casada y su esposo es pescador artesanal, tienen 3 hijos, que están estudiando.

Ernestina, se dedica a elaborar tortillas para vender, actividad en la que es muy hábil, fue su mamá quien le enseñó cuando tenía 12 años. 

Ernestina, necesita el crédito para comprar clavos y madera para colocar el techo de su vivienda nuevamente.

Ella sueña con adquirir un terreno más grande, donde sus hijos puedan edificar sus viviendas.
texts.en:
Ernestina, 34 years old, went to school up to the third grade at the school in her community. She is married and her husband is a traditional fisherman.  They have three children, who are students.

Ernestina works making tortillas to sell, work at which she is very skilled; it was her mother who taught her how when she was 12 years old.

Ernestina needs the loan to purchase nails and wood to install the roof on her house again.

She dreams of getting a larger plot of land, where her children can build their houses.

loans.use: to purchase nails and wood to install the roof on her house again.

loans.name: Isaac's Group

texts.en:
Isaac is 49 years old and has 5 children. He has been a farmer for 15 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Isaac is the only one featured in the above picture, he is actually representing his group of 10 farmers from the Webuye District, Kenya.

Isaac started working alongside One Acre Fund in 2010, and decided to do so because he wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since then, he has seen his life improve, especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since. This year he decided to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers.

Isaac’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 5.5 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar lights.  So, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 5 solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvest season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy electricity maintenance tools such as lights, cables, switches for her husband's business

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
As a married parent with two children, Emily is 33 years old and works hard to support her family.  She is a vegetable and poultry farmer.  

Emily is taking a loan to buy poultry feed to help improve growth and supply more volume. She has gained more customers in her enterprise, thus needs to maintain a consistent supply.  

She hopes that her business will go long way in helping her support her family and improving overall living standards such as better medical care and modern housing.
 
Emily is grateful to Kiva for the support.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed that will improve growth

loans.name: Grupo Agrícola Xejuyup 1 Group

texts.es:
Manuela (la primera del lado derecho de la fotografía de blusa verde) es de una comunidad de Xejuyup, tiene 32 años es soltera y tiene una hija de tres años.
Manuela una mujer muy trabajadora  y responsable que desde hace 10 años se dedica a la producción de banano ella lo hace con el afán de obtener sus ganancias y poder mantener a su familia, Manuela le gusta esta actividad porque le gusta la naturaleza, y porque desde muy pequeña ayudaba a sus padres a cultivar bananos, Manuela desde hace algunos días a plantado banano que ahora ya necesita mantenimiento, ella para que pueda darle ese mantenimiento tienen que comprar fertilizantes y pagar la mano de obra, pero ahora el precio del fertilizante está muy elevada, es por eso que Manuela se ha organizado con un grupo de señoras  que tienen la misma necesidad, para solicitar un prestamo para poder realizar la compra de fertilizantes y pagar la mano de obra.
El sueño de Manuela es poder conseguir este prestamo para conseguir buenas cosechas y seguir incrementado la producción.
texts.en:
Manuela (the first to the right wearing the green blouse) is from the community of Xejuyup. She is 32 years old, single and has a 3 years old daughter. Manuela is a hard-working and responsible woman who for 10 years has been growing bananas. She does this with the ambition of obtaining income to be able to support her family. Manuela likes this activity as she likes nature and because since she was little she helped her parents grow bananas.

Manuela planted some bananas a few days ago that need maintenance and she has to buy fertilizer to do this and pay for labor. The current price of fertilizer is very high. So it is for this reason that she has organized a group of women who have the same need to request a loan to be able to buy fertilizer and pay for labor. Manuela's dream is to be able to get this loan to have good harvests and continue to increase her production.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Maria, de 64 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudio hasta primer grado, no continuo sus estudios devido a la pobreza en que vivian sus padres, está casada y junto con su esposo procrearon 2 hijos, que ahora ya son mayores de edad, su esposo fallecio, debido a una enfermedad, ahora Maria solo vive con un hijo, un nieto y un bisnieto.

Maria, no trabaja porque desde hace 12 años recibe la pensión que le dejo su esposo, solamente se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar arena, piedra y cemento para construir un muro a la orilla de su casa, pues cuando llueve mucho el rio que está cerca, se llena y afecta su casa.

El sueño de Maria es comprar un terreno, donde pueda construir una vivienda amplia para sus nietos y bisnietos.
texts.en:
Maria, 64 years old, is a housewife. She went to school up to the first grade, and didn't continue her schooling due to the poverty in which her parents lived. She is married and with her husband had 2 children, who are now adults. Her husband died from an illness. Now Maria only lives with a son, a grandson and a great-grandson. 

Maria doesn't work because for the past 12 years she has gotten the pension that her husband left her. She only takes care of the household tasks.

The loan that she is requesting is to purchase sand, rocks, and cement to build a wall around her house, since when it rains a lot, the river that is nearby fills and affects her house. 

Maria's dream is to purchase a plot of land where she can build a large house for her grand children and great-grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase sand, rocks, and cement to build a wall around her house.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa, de 55 años de edad, es ama de casa, no estudio debido a la pobreza en que vivían, está acompañada y junto con su compañero de vida tiene 5 hijos, los cuales ya son mayores de edad y tienen sus propios hogares, su pareja trabaja cortando caña.

Josefa, trabaja en la siembra de maíz desde hace muchos años, este trabajo lo aprendió, porque tenia que obtener recursos para su sustento y el de su familia.- Josefa, viaja en bicicleta 4 kilómetros todos los días, para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo y su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m. 

El crédito que está solicitando en la institución es para comprar ganado, los cuales dentro de un tiempo le podrán dar un poco más de ingresos, cuando los venda.

El sueño de Josefa es, tener mucho ganado, para tener más ingresos y así no trabajar mñas en la siembra de maíz.
texts.en:
Josefa, 55 years old, is a housewife. She didn't go to school due to the poverty in which they lived. She is partnered and with her life partner has 5 children, who are adults and have their own homes. Her partner works cutting sugar cane. 

Josefa has worked growing corn for many years. She learned this work because she had to get resources to sustain herself and her family. Josefa travels by bicycle 4 kilometers every day to get to the the place where she works and her schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m.

The loan that she is asking the institution for is to purchase livestock, which in some time will give her a bit more income, when she sells them.

Josefa's dream is to have many animals to be able to have more income and in this way not work anymore growing corn.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Petronila Del Carmen

texts.es:
Petronila, de 38 años de edad, es ama de casa, no estudió y decidió aprender a trabajar para ayudar a su familia en los gastos de la casa; es viuda y tiene 5 hijos, de los cuales 3 de ellos se encuentran trabajando y 2 estudiando; cuando su esposo falleció, ella tuvo que tomar todas las responsabilidades de la casa.

Actualmente Petronila, se acompaño nuevamente y su pareja trabaja como vigilante en un cañal, mientras que ella se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas y a la crianza de especies menores como cerdos y pollos; este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres, para llegar a su lugar de trabajo tiene que caminar 2 kilómetros y su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. todos los días.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar 4 terneras, con las cuales podrá tener ganancias dentro de un periodo corto, así logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Petronila es, apoyar a sus hijos para que sean profesionales y tengan mejores posibilidades de trabajo; también, sueña en construir una vivienda de ladrillo, porque en la que vive es de adobe y esta demasiado deteriorada.
texts.en:
Petronila, 39 years old, is a housewife, didn't go to school, and decided to learn how to work to help her family with the household expenses. She is a widow and has 5 children, of whom 3 are working and 2 go to school. When her husband died, she had to take on all the household responsibilities. 

Currently, Petronila is partnered again and her partner works as a guard at a canal, while she works growing vegetables and raising small animals such as pigs and chickens. She learned this work from her parents. To get to the place where she works she has to walk 2 kilometers and her schedule is 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. every day.

The loan that she is asking for is to purchase 4 calves, with which she will be able to have earnings in a short time. In this way she will manage to give her family a better quality of life. 

Petronila's dream is to support her children so that they become professionals and have better work opportunities. In addition, she dreams of building a brick house because the one she lives in now is adobe and is too deteriorated.

loans.use: to purchase 4 calves. .

loans.name: María Herminia

texts.es:
María de 43 años de edad, solo estudió hasta 6 grado, está casada y tiene tres hijos, el esposo se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años y de los tres hijos solo dos dependen de ellos los cuales se encuentran estudiando, y el otro  ya se acompañó.


María se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, ya tiene más de 6 años en esta actividad y lo aprendió a través de una capacitación que recibió,  la granja la tiene a 20 mtrs de su casa , sus  hijos y el esposo se involucran junto a ella en el negocio.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar 200 pollos y también 18 quintales de concentrado, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a María a que pueda seguir generando ingresos económicos para su familia.

 Su sueño es mejorar la vivienda y darles un futuro mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
María is 43 years old and studied through 6th grade.  She is married and has 3 children.  Her husband has worked in agriculture for many years;  Only 2 of their 3 children are dependents, and they are studying.  The other lives with his partner.  

Maria works in raising broiler chickens.  She has 6 years of experience, and she first learned from a training she received.  The farm is 20 meters from her house, and her husband and children are also involved in the business.  

She needs the loan to buy 200 chickens and 1800 pounds of concentrate, and in this way you would be helping Maria to be able to continue generating an income for her family.   Her dream is to improve their house and give a better future to her family.

loans.use: to buy 200 chickens and 1800 pounds of chicken feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do maintenance on the courts and gymnasium.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Pedro, es casado,  tiene dos  hijos que son su razón de lucha y esfuerzo diario.
El  señor Pedro tiene una carbonería bien equipada, tiene local propio, casa propia. Comenta que se inició como repartidor luego puso su propia carbonería, que hasta hoy le va muy bien, con clientela ya bien formada por su antigüedad en el rubro.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de carbones en cantidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas y trabajo como lo vine haciendo.
texts.en:
Pedro is married and has two children.  They are his reason for being tenacious and putting forth great effort daily.

Pedro has a well-equipped business selling fuel.  He has his own place and his own house.  He says that he started as a delivery man, and then he established his own fuel business.  So far it is going very well for him.  He has a well-established clientele because of the long time he has spent in this line of work.

He is requesting this loan in order to be able to buy a large amount of charcoal.  This way he will be able to continue with his sales and his work as he is now doing.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.en:
Claudio is a 54-year-old sari-sari store owner from Moalboal, Cebu. He has operated his store for more than 10 years now. This is the source of his income. 

Claudio is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, cooking oil and condiments among others. Claudio believes that a loan will help him improve his stock thus attracting more buyers to his store.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, cooking oil and condiments among others.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.en: Marcelino is a 48-year-old married man and a father of five children from Moalboal, Cebu. He has earned a living through his tricycle transport business for more than 10 years now. Marcelino is asking for a loan to buy spare parts for the motorcycle like wheel tire, chains and nuts, and gasoline. A loan will help him improve his tricycle transport business thus augmenting his income and profit. In the future, Marcelino hopes to make his business a success.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the motorcycle like wheel tire, chains and nuts, and gasoline

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda, 51, is a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. Married to Agusto, she has four children of whom three are working and the other one is in high school. Imelda manages her household while operating a business. She works hard to augment their income to support and meet their daily personal and household needs and to send her child to school. 

Imelda operates a variety store. In the Philippines. This is basically a small convenience store which sells fresh, dry, and packaged goods directly to consumers. Almost all products are essential household items and food.  Imelda earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Aside from this, she also sells ornamental plants for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum net income of Php 800 a day. 

To help her continue operations of her small store, Imelda is requesting a Php 8,000 loan which she will use to buy grocery items such sacks of rice, canned goods, noodles, sodas and other grocery stuff. She is positive that this will boost her income as she expands her business. Her earnings are their source to meet their daily expenses and to send her child to school. She thanks God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Imelda hopes to maintain and grow her business so they could have a better life. She strives to be able to send her child to college, to see her become a professional. She prays for a quiet and healthy life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for groceries, beverages and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en:
Pamela is a lovely lady from rural Kenya. She has been doing mixed farming for 4 years to take care of her family. Her main income is from milk and crops grown on her farm. She stated that she loves what she does because it is sustainable for the environment and profitable as well. However, lack of funds is her biggest challenge.

Pamela is seeking a loan to purchase a chaff cutter. She has plans to expand her dairy farm by growing her milk production volume. A chaff cutter is going to help her achieve the objective by shredding fodder into little evenly cut pieces that the stock can quickly and easily ingest and digest. Feed in this form is also easily mixable to come up with a ration good for the stock. With your lending, Pamela's stock will grow healthy and productive. This will boost the amount of milk she takes to the market. Returns from the investment will enable her to repay the debt and afford education fees for her siblings.

loans.use: To purchase a chaff cutter.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Her name is Josephine, 51, resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. Married to Jamie, an OFW and has three children of which one is in High School, one in Elementary level one the other is working. She manages her household while operating the business. She works hard to augment their income to support and meet their daily personal, household needs and to send her children to school.

Josephine operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a general store is basically a small convenience store which sells fresh, dry, and packaged commodities directly to consumers. Almost all products are essential household items and food. She earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum net income of Php 800 a day.

To help her continue operations of her general store business she is requesting a Php 10000 loan which she will use to buy grocery items such as a sack of rice, can goods, noodles, soda and other grocery stuff. She is positive that it will boost her income as she expands her business. Her earnings is their source to meet their daily expense and to send her children to school. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Josephine hopes to maintain and grow her business so she they could have a better life. She strives to hard to give her children the best education possible and prays for a quiet and happy life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for groceries, beverages and toiletries to sell at her small store.

loans.name: Jeannete

texts.es:
Jeannete, administra una venta de ropa, cosméticos, sandalias y joyería de enchape, vive en casa propia con dos hijos, ellos le ayudan en el negocio, su actividad económica le permite cuidar de sus hijos y generar ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su familia, lo inicio por motivación propia y la desempeña desde hace ocho años.
Comprará prendas de vestir que están a la moda, sandalias, cosméticos y variedad de joyería de enchape, surtirá el negocio con nueva mercadería para tener un incremento en las ventas e ingresos, que le servirán para pagar la deuda adquirida.
Jeannete aspira a tener un negocio más grande para tener la oportunidad de trabajar con capital propio y asegurar para sus hijos un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Jeannete sells clothes, cosmetics, sandals and jewelry. She lives in her own house with her two children. They help her with the business. Her job allows her to take care of her children and generate income to cover her family's needs. She started it on her own will and she has worked in it for eight years. She will buy clothing items that are in fashion, sandals, cosmetics and a variety of jewelry items. She will stock up her business with new merchandise in order to increase her sales and income, and this will allow her to pay her loan. Jeannete wants to have a bigger business in order to have the opportunity to work with her own capital and assure that her children have a better future.

loans.use: to buy clothing items in fashion, sandals, cosmetics, and a variety of jewelry in order to stock up her business with new merchandise.

loans.name: Miria

texts.en:
Miria, aged 54 years, is a married woman with three children ages 30, 24 and 20. She comes from central ward, Central Division Bushenyi District. This is her fourth cycle with Ugafode. She deals in poultry and works for 24 hours a day when they are still young but then she rests when they mature. She started this poultry business in 2006 and since then she has never looked back. She has another source of income as her salary from local government since she is a civil servant with Bushenyi district. She started this poultry business to earn an income and increase on her earnings from the local government where she is employed.

Miria is borrowing ugx2,000,000 to buy more chicks. She is assured of clientele from hotels and restaurants in and around Ishaka and Bushenyi towns who buy eggs and broiler chicken for food. She also wants to be financially independent. Competition is her main challenge since most women are involved in chicken rearing. She works so hard to overcome this challenge. She asks UGAFODE Microfinance to stay in service like it has been doing.

loans.use: To buy poultry chicks for rearing

loans.name: Annah

texts.en:
The person in the photo is a Annah. She is eighty four years old, a widow with three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in (HiH EA) 2013. Annah is a dairy farmer. She is grateful to HiH EA enterprise training that has enabled her manage the enterprise well.

She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy more dairy goats to help improve the amount of milk supplied. She will be able to satisfy her customers' demand, thus earn better income to enable her to support her basic needs such as education, medical care and clothing.
Annah is happy for Kiva and their lenders for their intervention; she promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: to buy more dairy goats to improve her income and support her family.

loans.name: Ciriaco

texts.es:
Ciriaco de 38 años de edad,  estudió  hasta 2º grado, actualmente está acompañado y tiene 4 hijos que dependen de él, y su esposa se dedica al cuido de animales. 


Ciriaco se dedica al cuidado de cerdos y al comercio de ganado desde hace 12 años, además  se dedica a trabajar la tierra, él cultiva maíz, frijol, maicillo, etc el cual tiene 26 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, los conocimientos los adquirió  por su padre, el lugar donde trabaja está a 3 kilómetros de su casa y camina durante 45 minutos todos los días para llegar al lugar.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar 3 vacas, considera que con el apoyo de crédito le permitirá tener mayores ingresos porque tendrá la oportunidad de comprar mas ganado para la venta y obtener mayores ganancias  para solventar los gastos del hogar.


Su sueño es tener una granja de cerdos y para lograrlo va a trabajar con el comercio de ganado ya que también quiere darle la mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ciriaco is 38 years old.  He studied up to second grade, and currently has a partner and 4 children that depend on him and his spouse.  They make a living by raising animals. 

Ciriaco has made a living raising pigs and selling cattle for 12 years.  He also works his land and cultivates corn, beans, sorghum, etc.  He has 26 years of experience in farming, which he learned from his father.  His workplace is 3 kilometers from his house and he walks 45 minutes each day to get to work.  

He needs a loan to buy 3 cows, and with the help of the loan he will be able to have a better income because he will have the opportunity to buy more cows  to sell and have better income and break even with the household costs.  

His dream is to have a pig farm and to reach his dream he will work with cattle sales.  He also wants to give a better education to his children.

loans.use: to buy 3 cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for technical studies and specialization in the field of 3D animation.

loans.name: Dilbarniso

texts.ru: Дилбарнисо молодая жительница района Чиликул. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Детям 11 и 7 лет. Они ходят в школу. Мужу 34 лет. Он находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Дилбарнисо сама занимается земледелием, где имеет земельный участок. Она сажай урожай. Земледелие является основной источником жизни. Доход от этого бизнеса обеспечивает семью. Она хочет купить минеральные удобрения для посева урожай. Из-за нехватки средств Дилбарнисо обратилась за кредитом. Вы можете поддержать ее. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу доброту.
