Claudia is a very enterprising and creative woman. She has wanted to be independent and have her own beauty salon business for a long time. She will now be able to realize her dream thanks to her great capacity for work and to the support she is receiving from Corporación Interactuar and the people who want her to get ahead with her business. Her 5-year-old daughter, who is from her current marriage, will depend on this business.

She is asking for financial support to buy work chairs and tables, nail polish, and hair products, among other items to get started. With a loan, you will be able to support a young woman who is full of life and drive for her family!

loans.use: to buy work chairs and tables, nail polish, and hair products, among other items to get started.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Encarnación, hoy ella tiene mas de 13 operaciones canceladas con la fundación, es una persona muy trabajadora que esta esforzándose para que cada día le vaya mejor en su emprendimiento el cual es una despensa. Comenta que su anterior préstamo de kiva le fue muy útil para poder seguir creciendo por lo que se anima a pedir otro.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder surtir con productos variados, como ser bebidas, carne, condimentos, verduras, frutas y demás, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
Maria is from the city of Encarnación. Currently, she has more than 13 loans that she has repaid with the Fundación. She is a very hard-working person who is making an effort so that everyday goes better in her business, which is a store. She says that her previous loan from Kiva was very useful for continuing to grow, so she decided to ask for another. 

She asks for this loan so that she can buy supplies to stock her store with various products, including drinks, meats, condiments, vegetables, fruits, and other things. She is thankful for this new opportunity that she receives to be able to continue growing and going forward.

loans.use: to buy drinks, meat, condiments, vegetables, fruits, and other things.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.en:
Luis is 26 years old and married with one small daughter. They all live in his parent’s house. Luis started a butcher shop that is well-located and he works from Monday through Sunday. In March, he will have been operating his shop for two years. Fortunately, Luis has been able to maintain his business and grow it a little bit. One of his biggest satisfactions has been he was able to pay for his wedding with the earnings from his business.

Luis is requesting a loan to buy meat. His loan will help increase his sales. Luis’s challenge is to grow his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy meat to sell in his butcher shop

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert is a final year student at the Accra Polytechnic Institute, studying for a diploma in Civil Engineering. The loan is to help pay for his school fees. His inspiration comes from his mother. He looks up to her for everything, so he prays to God for support in order to achieve all his objectives, to make her proud and happy.

He has an interest in his profession because it is one of the best professions in the world. The completion of his studies would financially benefit his family and society at large. In the next few years to come, Gilbert will start working and utilizing his skills learned at school to support his family, community, and the country at large. However, denial of this loan would affect him badly because he has exams pending and, without the payment of his fees, he would not be permitted to take the exams and his dream of becoming one of the best structural engineers in the world cannot be realized.

He would want investors to help support the educational system in Ghana, so that the youth in the country would have a vibrant future.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fees.

loans.name: Ovidio Antonio

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajador, así es Ovidio, un hombre guerrero que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Puerto Berrio, donde se gana la vida con la venta y distribución de carne en una pequeña carnicería.
Trabaja solo todos los días durante 6 horas.

Sus productos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su negocio porque saben que podrán encontrar carne de excelente calidad.

Ovidio ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar mesas de trabajo y congeladores.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a este hombre con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hard-working, that is Ovidio.  He is a fighter who has dedicated a large part of his life to taking care of his children.  He lives in Puerto Berrio, where he earns his living selling and distributing meat in his small butcher's shop.  He works by himself for six hours every day. 

Ovidio's products are well known among the neighbors where he lives.  They come to his shop because they know they will be able to find excellent quality meat there. 

Ovidio has decided to improve his business and increase his sales.  That is why he has sought out a loan; he will purchase work tables and freezers. 

This loan will allow Ovidio to get his business ahead and to earn the income he needs to be able to continue supporting his family and his business. 

Support this man by giving him a loan and make his dreams a reality!

loans.use: to purchase work tables and freezers.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Héctor tiene 46 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en el Distrito de Querocotillo con sus 04 hijos, una comunidad con clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café, maíz amarillo, ganadería y comercio que se ubica en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la destilación de “aguardiente”, una bebida que se procesa artesanalmente a base del jugo de la caña, con un equipo artesanal llamado trapiche. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de equipos de destilación que le permitirán procesar en mayor cantidad y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Héctor is 46 years old. He is in a common law marriage and lives with his four children in the District of Querocotillo, a community with a varied climate whose population works in agriculture, particularly in the cultivation of coffee, yellow corn, livestock, and trade. Located in the Province of Cutervo, it belongs to the Cajamarca region of the northern highlands of Perú.

He works distilling "aguardiente" a beverage that is processed in an artisanal manner with a sugar cane juice base using a piece of artisanal equipment called "trapiche" (a type of mill). He has requested a loan for the purchase of distillation equipment that will allow him to distill in greater quantity and thus generate a larger income for his family and to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: purchase equipment that will allow him to distill in greater quantity

loans.name: Jose Dario

texts.es:
Jose de 74 años, es casado y tiene una hija, desde hace 3 años tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes  la cual atiende en compañía de su esposa (Ver Foto) 
Tiene como sueño ampliar su tienda donde distribuye artículos como leche, granos, verduras, lácteos y otros. 
En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Jose, en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario como granos, azúcar, galletería, lácteos para incrementar su oferta y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de todo negocio como son los servicios públicos, impuestos, y demás; mejorara también el bienestar de él y el de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 74 years old. He is married and has a daughter. For 3 years, he has had a small grocery store, which he manages along with his wife (see the photo).

His dream is to grow his store, where he sells items, including milk, grains, vegetables, dairy products, and other things.

At present, he has little stock, and this is harmful since he cannot supply many of the products that his clients ask for.

Jose, in light of this, decided to request a loan with the goal of becoming more organized and buying wholesale the supply he needs, including grains, sugar, cookies, and dairy products to increase his offerings and to offer better service to his clients. This will also lead to an increase in his income, which will help him pay for the basic needs of his business, including public services, taxes, and other things. It will also improve his and his family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy wholesale the supply he needs, including grains, sugar, cookies, and dairy products.

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es:
Octavio ha podido acumular grandes experiencias gratas en su vida, una de ellas es el haber podido trabajar en diferentes tiendas de abarrotes en el municipio de Sincelejo.
Es un padre amoroso y responsable de 10 hijas y tiene muy presente el significado de la familia en su proceso productivo.
El siempre fue muy inquieto y con gran vocación de servicio, cualidades que lo motivaron para iniciar con su propia tienda de abarrotes y hacerla muy reconocida en el sector.
Hoy en día es un hombre amable y muy emprendedor, siempre buscando alternativas para que sus clientes se sientan bien atendidos y comprando productos de calidad.

El solicita apoyo económico para obtener un préstamo y realizar la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar, pues planea aumentar su oferta de productos y desea tener un inventario mucho más grande, así podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes. 
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran distribuidora de víveres, considera que poco a poco y con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.
texts.en:
Octavio has been able to accumulate many fantastic experiences in his life, and one of them has been being able to work in different grocery stores in the city of Sincelejo.  He is a loving, responsible father of ten daughters, and the importance of family is always foremost in his mind in his productive process. He has always been restless and driven to serve, qualities that motivated him to start his own grocery store and make it well known throughout the area.  

These days, he is an enterprising, friendly man who is always searching for ways to help his customers feel like they are well served and buying high quality products. He is currently requesting economic assistance in obtaining a loan, which he will use to stock his store with household goods. He plans to expand his product selection and wants to have a much larger inventory so that he has more merchandise available to his customers. 

His biggest goal is to have a big distribution network of goods. He believes that a little at a time and with the help of Corporación Interactuar, he can achieve it.

loans.use: stock his store with household merchandise

loans.name: Ingrid Paola

texts.es:
La señora Ingrid tiene gran experiencia en el área de carnicería, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia carnicería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.

Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm
Actualmente necesita un auxilio para realizar adecuaciones a su local ya que este necesita algunas reformas para continuar funcionando.

El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones además de poder comprar surtido de carne para su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran carnicería que surta diferentes tiendas y comercializadoras
Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada teniendo en cuenta que para este tipo de negocios se necesitan algunas condiciones especiales.
texts.en:
Ingrid has a lot of experience as a butcher. She started her own butcher shop some time ago and she's gotten really good results. She's always preferred to work independently. She works every day from 8:00am until 9:00pm. Currently, she needs a hand to make some improvements to her shop. Various repairs are needed for her to be able to keep working.

This loan will help her work in better conditions and guarantee the quality of her cuts. Additionally, she will be able to buy additional meat to supply her business. Her biggest goal is to have a large butcher service that supplies different stores and sellers.

With this help, she will be able to work in a more organized way, bearing in mind that this type of business requires some special conditions.

loans.use: stock her butcher shop and make needed repairs

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres unidas se formó en ciudad del este, es un grupo que se está esforzando para que cada una de las integrantes mejoren sus condiciones de vida. Forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que les permite conocer la situación de vida de cada una y conforme ello esforzarse por mejorar.
Zonia integra este grupo, ella es peluquera, tiene su modesta peluquería donde atiende a sus clientes que siempre van hasta su negocio, con sacrificio y entusiasmo siempre lucha, y da el ejemplo a sus compañeras. Pese a todo lo que tuvo que pasar siempre esta con una sonrisa.
Pide este préstamo para que pueda invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su peluquería, como cremas, tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, y otros productos que siempre usa para poder dar una buena atención a sus clientes y clientas, agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The group called Mujeres Unidas (women united) was formed in Ciudad del Este. This group is striving so that each one of its members can better their living conditions. They are part of the eradication of poverty program, which allows them to better understand each other’s’ living situations and make an effort to improve.

Zonia is a member of this group. She is a hairdresser and has a modest salon where she looks after her customers, who are always loyal to her business. Zonia is determined, shows sacrifice and enthusiasm and sets an example for her peers. Despite everything that she has had to go through she always has a smile on her face.

Zonia is requesting this loan so that she can invest it in supplies for her salon such as lotions, hair dye, shampoo, rinses and other products that she always uses to provide her customers with a good service. She is grateful for this opportunity as it will help her a lot.

loans.use: to buy lotions, hair dye, shampoo, rinses and other products

loans.name: Rosa Nohemi

texts.es:
Rosa de 31 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado sus padres decidieron no ponerla más a estudiar, pues su familia era numerosa y ella tenía que trabajar para aportar económicamente, está acompañada y su esposo es carpintero desde hace mucho tiempo, actualmente ellos son padres de 2 hijos de las edades de 15 y 12 años actualmente se encuentran estudiando en la escuela. En su vivienda viven  4 personas  sus 2 hijos su esposo y ella y son las únicas personas que dependen de Rosa.


Su principal actividad económica es la venta de ropa para damas, niños y caballeros de diferente estilos y tallas, comenta que tiene ya 3 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, lo aprendió gracias a su hermana que se dedica a lo mismo, el negocio no lo tiene estable pues ella tiene que salir a vender a los pueblos cercanos, además de esta actividad también se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su vivienda sin faltar el apoyo económico de su esposo.

Rosa utilizará el financiamiento del préstamo, para comprar 1 docena de blusas para damas, 1 docena de  camisetas, para caballeros, ropa interior para ambos sexos, entre otras.

Rosa desea para un futuro tener su propio local donde pueda tener variedad de estilos de ropa y tallas para sus clientes, también que sus hijos sigan estudiando y que su esposo siga con su negocio de carpintería.
texts.en:
Rosa is 31 years old and studied up to Grade 5. Her parents decided not to have her study anymore as the family was very large and she had to work to help out economically.

She is married and he husband has been a carpenter for a long time. They are the parents of two children aged 12 and 15 who are studying in school. Four people live in their house, her two children her husband and her and they are the only people who depend on Rosa.

Her main economic activity is selling clothing for women, children and men in different styles and, sizes. She comments that she has been in this business for 3 years which she learned from her sister who does the same business. Her business is not stable and she has to go out to sell in the nearby communities. Besides this activity she does the housework in her house and has the economic support of her husband.

Rosa will use the loan to buy a dozen blouses, a dozen shirts for men, underwear for both sexes amongst other things. Rosa wants in the future to have her own store where she can have a variety of clothing styles and sizes for her clients, that her children continue to study and that her husband continues with his carpentry business.

loans.use: to buy a dozen blouses, a dozen shirts for men, underwear for both sexes amongst other things.

loans.name: Zayd

texts.en:
Zayd is a jewelry designer who specializes in sterling silver and gemstone jewelry. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including silver and semi-precious gemstones.

Zayd has been selling through NOVICA since 2005. This is his story:

Zayd learned to design and craft jewelry by coincidence. "I wanted to create a gift for my wife's birthday, so I made a pair of earrings and she loved them! Many of her friends asked if I could make some for them, and that's how it all got started!"

"This microcredit will allow me to increase my inventory and create new designs. I want to thank all of you who are supporting my business; I appreciate it so much. Thank you!"

Use the link below to view Zayd's sterling silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site:

http://www.novica.com/kiva/5371

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including silver and semi-precious gemstones.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blocks, rebar, cement and gravel.

loans.name: Fernanda Maria

texts.es:
Fernanda ha sido una ama de casa muy dedicada, siempre pendiente del cuidado de su familia conformada por sus 2 hijos y su esposo; desde siempre le ha gustado trabajar como comerciante independiente, comenzó a vender mercancía desde hace 5 años, pues es responsable de llevar la carga económica del hogar junto con su esposo y necesita generar los recursos para hacerlo. 
Sus clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos del sector, trabaja sola todos los días en su negocio y encuentra en su labor la ventaja de poder estar pendiente de su familia, al mismo tiempo que logra ser productiva como comerciante.

Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor de artículos desechables, pues es una gran oportunidad en esta época del año, esto le permitirá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de inicio de año, dando como resultado la obtención de mejores ingresos para su familia.
Fernanda manifiesta que su mayor deseo es poder seguir apoyando económicamente a su familia y dar educación a todos sus hijos, para verlos convertirse en profesionales y tengan un futuro próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
Fernanda has been a dedicated housewife, always attentive to the care of her family, comprised of two children and her husband. She has always liked working as an independent salesperson and started selling merchandise five years ago. She and her husband are responsible for the household economy and they need to generate the resources to keep it afloat.

Her customers are her neighbors, family, and friends from the area. She works alone at her business every day, and appreciates being able to be there for her family while at the same time being a productive merchant.

Currently, she is requesting this loan to buy disposable household items at wholesale as there's a great opportunity at this time of year. This will allow her to supply her store with more variety to meet the demand that increases around the start of the year. All of this will mean greater income for her family.

Fernanda says that her biggest goal is to continue to support her family economically and provide her children with an education, seeing them become professionals and have a bright, prosperous future.

loans.use: supply her business with disposable goods to sell

loans.name: 19 Tân Lộc Hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Huệ is 29 years old and she is married with two children.

Huệ is a fisherman. She is requesting a loan to purchase more tools to raise scallops to sell in the future. She has been involved in this business for nine years. The main hardship that Huệ faces in her business is the lack of capital.

This is Huệ's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She is the group leader of the 19 Tân Lộc Hải Lộc solidarity group, which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more tools to raise scallops to sell in the future.

loans.name: 06 Lạch Trường Hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Lý is 46 years old and she is married with five children.

Lý works in agriculture raising poultry. She has been involved in this business for two years. The main hardship that Lý faces in her business is the lack of capital.She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

This is Lý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is the group leader of the 06 Lạch Trường Hải Lộc solidarity group, which consists of four members.

With her business profit, Lý hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Freddy Daniel

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos más conocido como  Cantón del amor lleno de gente amable y trabajadora, es un lugar muy turístico, por las diversas cascadas y hosterías y el maravilloso clima, aquí encontramos la cascada del amor al cual se puede llegar muy rápido por el teleférico que tenemos en este Cantón, 
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio el señor Freddy un hombre luchador de 36 el es casado de esta larga y hermosa relación tienen 3 hijos la mayor de 13 años y el ultimo de 7 años, la esposa se dedica a la venta de ropa puerta a puerta por catálogo,
El se dedica a la carpintería realiza toda clase de muebles, con esta actividad saca adelante a su familia, apoyándolos en todo lo necesario, aprendió de la misma actividad cuando trabajaba en una carpintería del sector, al negocio le dedica un promedio de 8 horas diarias, solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de herramientas, con esta nueva inversión mejoraran sus trabajos he ingresos económicos, el señor Freddy agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos, better known as the "Canton of Love," is filled with friendly, hard-working people. It's a touristy area thanks to the various waterfalls and inns and the wonderful climate. Here one can visit the Waterfall of Love, quickly reached via the cable car here in the canton.

This is where Freddy lives and runs his business. He's a hard-working man, 36 years old, in a long, lovely marriage that has produced three children, ages 13 to 7 years. His wife sells clothing by catalog from door to door.

He himself is a carpenter who makes all kinds of furniture. This work lets him get his family ahead, supporting them with all that they need. He learned the work by working at a different carpenter's shop in the area. He dedicates about 8 hours a day to his business.

He is requesting this loan which he will use to buy tools of the trade. With this investment, he improve his work and his income. Freddy is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for the support and the provided opportunity.

loans.use: buy tools for his carpentry business

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer muy emprendedora y tenaz, con grandes deseos que ha estado cultivando y tratando de cumplir.

Tiene un pequeño negocio de preparación y venta de alimentos como arepas, tamales y comidas regionales en un puesto de comidas.
Con esta actividad intenta día a día  salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia compuesta por su esposo y sus hijos quienes son el motor de su vida y su motivación para luchar diariamente.

Su mayor dificultad es la competencia del sector, pero con su gran capacidad de trabajo es capaz de sostenerse y progresar.
Maria solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra una carpa, mejoramiento de su carro de comidas y compra de ingredientes para sus preparaciones.

Con tu ayuda Maria Podrá pagar la educación de su hijo que es uno de sus más grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Maria is a tenacious, hard-working woman with big dreams that she is developing and achieving.

She runs a small business making and selling food such as arepas, tamales, and regional foods from a food cart. Everyday, she is works to get ahead and improve her family's living conditions. Her husband and her children are her drive in life and her motivation for the daily grind.

Her greatest difficulty is the competition in the area, but with her ability to work hard, she is able to sustain herself and make progress.  Maria is requesting this loan to buy an awning, improve her food cart, and buy ingredients for her foods. 

With your help, Maria will be able to pay for her son's education, which is one of her biggest dreams.

loans.use: buy an awning, improve her food cart, and buy ingredients

loans.name: Angie Carolina

texts.es:
Angie es una bella mujer de 18 años de edad, madre de una hija de 3 años, criada con unas muy buenas costumbres, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión y gusto por todo lo relacionado con la belleza.  

Inicio su etapa productiva realizando cursos y capacitaciones, hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio de salón de belleza en su hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de una silla y mesa de manicure y pedicura, compra de secador, plancha y espejo.

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con todos los insumos necesarios para operar y ofrecer cualquier servicio que lleguen a solicitarle.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese de la mano de Interactuar y tenga muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Angie is a beautiful, 18-year old woman who is the mother of a 3-year old daughter.  She raises her daughter with very good habits.  Since high school, Angie has had a great passion and taste for everything related to beauty. 

Angie started her work by taking courses and trainings.  Then came the day she decided to take a risk and seek out her own clientele by opening a beauty salon business in her home.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase a manicure table, a pedicure chair, a dryer, an iron and a mirror. 

The loan is very important for Angie, as it will allow her to finish establishing her business by adding the missing pieces she needs to operate and offer any service that may be requested. 

Angie's dreams are that her business progress in hand with Interactuar and that she have a lot of customers.

loans.use: to purchase a manicure table, a pedicure chair, a dryer, an iron and a mirror.

loans.name: Alexandra

texts.es:
Sin mucho capital, Alexandra montó su taller de confección con el ánimo de generar ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener los gastos de su hogar donde convive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo. 

La actividad la aprendió realizando algunos cursos y esto le ha permitido realizar trabajos que se caracterizan por su buena calidad y su puntualidad en la entrega. 

Con sus trabajos, Alexandra ha logrado captar un número de clientes que le han garantizado ventas mensuales, por lo que espera que su negocio siga creciendo y posteriormente pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Con la finalidad de responder a la demanda sus clientes, Alexandra busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una maquina fileteadora y recubridora.

Alexandra espera que así su familia pueda gozar de unos mejores ingresos los cuales les permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida y una educación de mejor calidad. 

Además, Alexandra espera que si su negocio sigue ampliándose a un buen ritmo y que en su taller pueda generar como mínimo un empleo para una persona que lo requiera y no tenga oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Without much capital, Alexandra began her sewing workshop with the wish to generate income with which to be able to sustain the household expenses where she lives with her two children and her husband.
She learned the work taking some courses which have allowed her to create work characterized by their good quality and her punctuality in delivery.
With her work, Alexandra has be able to attract a number of clients who have guaranteed her monthly sales, because of which she hopes that her business will continue growing and later on she will be able to generate employment for needy people.
With the objective of responding to the demand of her customers, Alexandra seeks a loan which will allow her to purchase a machine for filleting and covering.
Alexandra hopes that in this way her family will be able to enjoy some better income which will allow them to have a better quality of life and an education of better quality.
In addition, Alexandra hopes that her business will continue growing at a good pace and that in her workshop she will be able to generate employment for a person who needs it and doesn't have opportunities for work.

loans.use: to buy a machine for filleting and covering.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a drill, a cutter and a polisher.

loans.name: Cindy

texts.en:
The Grand Strand area around Myrtle Beach is a place of pristine white sands, foamy, lapping waves, chandeliered restaurants, and sky-scraping hotels. And a vital need for quality cleaners to keep the tourist destination in top shape. 

Cindy, a native of Missoula, Montana, knows that. Since she started her own cleaning company two years ago, her efficient and thorough work has earned her a glowing reputation. In fact, she experienced a sudden expansion of customers in the last year. 

However, the fast growth rate has prevented her from building enough capital to accommodate the needs of her customers. She risks losing business and her good reputation due to insufficient equipment and employees.

With this loan, Cindy will be able to invest in cleaning equipment, a new vehicle, train new employees, and purchase uniforms. She plans to also expand advertising efforts. This will allow her company to reach its full potential, addressing the needs of her customers and gaining new ones. Cindy’s vision for the future is to have financial security and self-satisfaction regarding her career. She will also continue her dedication to optimizing customer satisfaction.

loans.use: to expand her cleaning business by investing in an additional vehicle, purchasing supplies, and hiring and training new employees

loans.name: Lizet

texts.en: Lizet is 26 years old and she lives with her parents She loves them very much and she does anything to help at her house. Lizet is going to college but she is also working. She sells shoes and she has been doing that since 3 years ago. Lizet needs a loan to buy more shoes that will give her the chance to increase her income because she will buy shoes for men and women. Lizet is very responsible and she wants to have her own store in the future. Currently she visits her customers to offer shoes using a catalog.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Ari Mpya Group

texts.en:
Magreth, who is in her late 30s, is single with two kids who are still in school. She has been a food vendor for nine years now. She works from 6am to 9pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Magreth's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep on increasing her stock of food and has paid back all her loans successfully. She used the profit to pay school fees and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to increase her stock of food and serve more customers. She dreams of buying a plot of land and building her own house.

Magreth will share this loan with her loan group "Ari Mpya" which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her stock of food and serve more customers.

loans.name: Dario

texts.en:
Dario is an artisan from Peru who specializes in handcrafted silver jewelry. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including silver and semi-precious gemstones.

Dario has been selling through NOVICA since 2006. This is his story:

Dario began helping out in a jewelry workshop when he was 15 during school vacations. Little by little, this activity became a passion. He realized how much he enjoyed working with meticulous details and eventually found a great deal of satisfaction in creating jewelry that people liked. "Beauty can be expressed in different forms and manners," he says. "The challenge for a country like Peru is to get ahead little by little, despite the many difficult circumstances that exist. It's important that people appreciate the art of jewelry, as many don't value the effort it requires."

"Thanks to past loans, I have been able to acquire tools for my workshop. Now I would like to create new collections, and so this microcredit will permit me to obtain the stones and silver that I will need to do so."

Use the following link to view Dario's handcrafted silver jewelry on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/5621

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including silver and semi-precious gemstones.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is 36 years old, married, and together with his spouse they have been blessed with four children. He operates a motorcycle transport business and has been in the business for five years now and it has been profitable. 

Bernard will use this loan to buy another motorcycle and serve more customers. This will enable him to make more income which he will use to provide for his family's needs such as food and school fees for his children. 

This is Bernard's first loan term with VisionFund Kenya and in his future he hopes to expand his transport business and even start a spare parts selling shop.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle and serve more customers and make more income.

loans.name: Twum-Danso

texts.en:
“My name is Twum-Danso, a third year student at the Radford University College, and I am pursuing a Bachelor of Science program in Physician Assistant. The loan facility is to help pay for my school fees.

I find it a blessing to be able to assist people who are sick especially the aged, and infants which is one of the reasons I chose my profession. This would allow me to reach a great number of people across my community, family and the nation as a whole and my degree will give me the necessary validity to practice as a professional.

About my profession there are a lot of people I look up to and also inspire me to push forward; they include Dr Ben Carson who is the best neurosurgeon in the world and Dr Kwabena F. Boateng who through his relentless efforts helped establish the National Cardiothoracic Center in Korle Bu Accra, Ghana. He is also one of the best Cardiologists in the world.

I see myself in the next five to ten years as one of the very best Physician Assistants that Ghana will produce where I can help the sick and the needy, and without education I do not see how that would be possible since one cannot become a health worker by staying at home”.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 41 years old and married to Basantine. They have been blessed with two children who are in primary school. He does electronics repair and also sells electronics, a business he has run for nine years. 

Paul will be using this loan to purchase electrical items for resale. He will also buy electronic equipment and instruments for use in his business. This will enable him to serve more customers and make more profits which will enable him to pay school fees for his children. 

This is his fifth loan term with VisionFund Kenya, after having paid his previous loans well. His future hopes are to become an electronics supplier in the region, and make more income to educate his children to higher levels of education.

loans.use: to buy electrical items and equipment for resale/use and be able to serve more customers.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard has been running a motorcycle transport business in Eldoret town for 3 years. He is 22 years old, married, and together with his spouse they have been blessed with one child. 

Benard will use this loan to buy another motorcycle and be able to serve more customers. This will enable him to make more income to improve his family's living standards. 

This is his first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and his future hopes and plans are to expand his transport business by buying more motorcycles from the income that he generates.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle and expand his business as well as make more income to provide for his family's needs.

loans.name: Maria Natividad

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos un Cantón de clima cálido húmedo rodeado de gente amable y trabajadora, este se encuentra ubicado al noroccidente de la provincia de pichincha, este Cantón tiene varios sitios turísticos uno de ellos es la cascada del amor, tradicionalmente se realiza las festividades por aniversario del mismo 
En este Cantón vive la señora María una mujer emprendedora de 21 años, mantiene una sólida relación en unión libre el esposo trabaja como jornalero en el consejo provincial, tienen 2 hijos por los que día a día luchan para darles un futuro mejor. La señora María solicita este crédito para emprender en un negocio , en una granja de pollos, de este negocio aprendió por iniciativa propia al mismo le dedicara un promedio de 6 horas diarias con esta inversión podrá apoyar con los gastos del hogar y continuar ayudando a la preparación de sus pequeños hijos.
La señora María agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos is a canton with a warm, humid climate, and friendly, hard-working people. It is located in the northwest part of Pichincha Province. This canton has a number of tourist sites, one of which is the Waterfall of Love where the canton's birthday is traditionally celebrated.

Maria lives in this canton. She is a 21-year-old enterprising woman who has a strong common law relationship. Her husband works as a day laborer for the local government. They have two children for whom they struggle day after day to give them a better future. 

Maria is asking for this loan so she can start a business raising chickens. She learned about this business on her own initiative and will dedicate an average of six hours every day to it. This investment will enable her to help with the household expenses and continue raising her small children. Maria is grateful to Fundacion Alternativa and to Kiva for the support and the opportunity they are providing.

loans.use: to start up her chicken farm to earn income to help with household expenses.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon sells cattle in Nakuru town and has been in this business for 15 years now.  He is 79 years old and married to Margaret. They have been blessed with five children who are all adults.

He will use this loan to buy more cattle to sell and be able to meet the demands and needs of his customers. This will also enable him to generate more profits, which he will use to educate his children and provide healthcare and food for his family.

This is his fourth loan from VisionFund Kenya and he has repaid his previous loans well. In future, he hopes to expand his business as well as make more income and improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: To buy cattle to sell and be able to meet the demands and needs of his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a second year student at the Central University College pursuing a degree in nursing. The loan is to help pay for her school fees in order to further her education.

She sees herself managing her own health facility in the next five to ten years after the completion of her degree. Health is the utmost priority of every individual and the completion of her studies would broaden her scope and expose her to the challenges ahead in helping the sick. She inspires herself to work towards her goals because she does not want to be dependent on her parents as well as her husband.

If she had not accessed this loan her education would be delayed and also the cost involved in educating herself would be more by the time she managed to save for her education as compared to the support Kingsbridge is offering her.

“My country is a very peaceful place for investment opportunities due to the absence of war and its attendant problems so I would ask investors to come and invest in Ghana,” she says.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees.

loans.name: Fanny Stella

texts.es:
Fanny, una madre de 49 años de edad con 5 hijos, es madre responsable y ha podido sostener a su numerosa familia gracias a que trabaja como productora agropecuaria en una finca. 

Solicita un crédito para iniciar su propio negocio, una pequeña empresa que iniciaría con cerdos pequeños los cuales criara y alimentara en los corrales de su finca, la iniciativa la tomo básicamente por sus hijos porque quiere disfrutar con ellos de una mejor vida, que estudien y que todos los días tengan un motivo para sonreír. 

Apoyen a esta empresaria que quiere demostrar que puede salir adelante.
texts.en:
Fanny, 49, is the mother of five children.  She is a responsible mother and has been able to sustain her large family thanks to working as an agricultural producer on a farm.
She is requesting a loan in order to initiate her own business, a small operation which she will start with piglets which she will raise and feed in the corrals of her farm.  She took the initiative basically for her children because she wishes to enjoy with them a better life, that they study and that every day they have a reason to smile.
Support this businesswoman who wants to show that she can get ahead!

loans.use: to buy piglets for her farm.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda, who works alongside her husband, Ruben, specializes in handcrafted jade jewelry and Maya masks. She would like to invest in a bulk purchase of jade and silver.

Gilda has been selling through NOVICA since 2012. This is her story:

"Our story begins in a town near Antigua. Gilda grew up in a home of woodcarvers and I grew up in a family of silversmiths," Ruben explains. "We began our first steps as artisans while still going to school. We met when we were 16 years old, both very young and very much in love," Gilda says with a smile. "We are artisans who work with our hearts, with dedication and love.

This microcredit will help us purchase the raw materials we need to craft our jewelry for our customers. Muchas gracias!"

Use the link below to view Gilda's handcrafted jade jewelry and Maya masks on the NOVICA site:

http://www.novica.com/kiva/8685

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of jade and silver

loans.name: Jose De Jesus

texts.es:
Jose, con 35 años de edad, se ha dedicado por muchos años a vender abarrotes en una tienda en el municipio de Medellin; de esta forma complementa los ingresos con los que ha sacado adelante a sus hijos.

Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido luchar incansablemente, siempre buscando la manera de salir adelante, esto lo impulsa a solicitar el crédito para comprar una vitrina y comprará surtido al por mayor como mecato, gaseosas, dulces, productos de panadería, entre otros, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y tendrá más variedad de artículos para ofrecer a los clientes, mejorando así las ventas y los ingresos.

Jose manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder adquirir un local propio ubicado en el centro de la ciudad para montar su negocio y lograr que sea mucho más rentable y que le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable para brindar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

El confía en el apoyo de la Corporación interactuar y en los prestamistas de Kiva para lograr este objetivo.
texts.en:
Jose, who is 35-years old, has made his living for many years selling groceries from a store in Medellin.  That is how he supplements his income, which he uses to get his children ahead. 

His tenacity and perseverance have allowed Jose to work tirelessly.  He is constantly looking for a way to get ahead, which is what motivated him to request the loan.  He will use it to purchase a display case and whole stock such as pastries, sodas, sweets, bakery items etc.  This will allow him to continue working and to have a greater variety of items to sell to his customers.  All of this will improve his sales and his income. 

Jose says that his greatest desire is to be able to acquire his own storefront in the city center and start a business there.  Making this happen would be much more profitable and would guarantee favorable financial stability, allowing him to offer his family a better quality of life. 

Jose trusts in Interactuar's support and the Kiva lenders to help him reach his objective.

loans.use: to purchase a display case and wholesale stock such as pastries, sodas, sweets, bakery items etc.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is an artisan from Guatemala who specializes in ceramic ornaments and figurines. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including paint, clay and brushes.

Jose has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is his story:

"My favorite thing to do is to create new designs and I love the challenge of crafting and painting them by hand," says Guatemala's Jose. "Each design is proof of the richness of our culture. Working with ceramics has brought me many beautiful things, from learning the craft from my mother and uncles, to providing for my family so that my four children can go to the university. I already have a grandchild and my wish for all of them is that they become independent people with a career of their choice. That they be responsible and be respectful of God."

"This microcredit will help with upkeep of my workshop and allow me to acquire the raw materials that I need. Paint, in particular, represents a heavy cost for me, and being able to purchase in bulk will be greatly advantageous. Muchas gracias!"

Use the link below to view Jose's ceramic ornaments and figurines on the NOVICA site:

http://www.novica.com/kiva/7521

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including paint, clay and brushes
